verbose_text: Furthermore, treatment with t-BHQ, an activator of Nrf2, was observed to attenuate IIR induced tissue injury, mitigate intestinal barrier dysfunction, reduce proinflammatory cytokines and apoptotic factors, and inhibit IkappaB kinase / IkappaB phosphorylation and NF-kappaB nuclear translocation.
evidence: t-BHQ, an activator of Nrf2, was observed to attenuate IIR
